## DynamicFormStore.getOptions$() method

Get options stored in formState with the provided getter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getOptions$<T>(getter: OptionsGetter<T>): Observable<T[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  getter | [OptionsGetter](./dynamic-forms.optionsgetter.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Observable&lt;T\[\]&gt;

An observer of the options returned by the getter.
